p: A total of 51 client owned dogs fulfilled the inclusion criteria and were included in this retrospective study. The median age of dogs was 6.4 years (range, 7 months to 11.4 years). There were 9 sexually intact females, 26 spayed females, 8 sexually intact and neutered males, respectively. CT of thorax and abdomen were performed in 7 and radiographs of the thorax and abdominal ultrasound in 44 dogs. Fine needle aspirates (FNAs) were collected in 28 dogs.
